mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (company_id, name, biz_no, address, phone) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{name}, #{bizNo}, #{address}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM company WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT company_id AS companyId, name AS name, biz_no AS bizNo, address AS address, phone AS phone, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS createdAt FROM company WHERE 1=1
AND INSTR(LOWER(name), LOWER(#{name})) > 0
AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC, company_id DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM company WHERE 1=1
AND INSTR(LOWER(name), LOWER(#{name})) > 0
AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET deleted_at = SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM COMPANY WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
